users.circumstances: Blackbeard stole the power from Whitebeard's corpse using an unknown method involving a black cloth. He demonstrated the ability immediately after the transfer, shocking the entire world.

abilityReveals.description: Blackbeard demonstrates the ability to create powerful tremors and earthquakes using Whitebeard's former power, punching the air with his left hand to generate shockwaves.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Blackbeard uses the power immediately after stealing it from Whitebeard to prove to the world that he has acquired the Gura Gura no Mi and can wield two Devil Fruits simultaneously.

strengths.description: The Gura Gura no Mi is stated to be the strongest Paramecia-type Devil Fruit, capable of destroying the world itself.

users.circumstances: Blackbeard continues to use his original Devil Fruit power alongside the newly acquired Gura Gura no Mi.

abilityReveals.description: The Yami Yami no Mi's unique properties are theorized to be connected to Blackbeard's ability to possess two Devil Fruits. The darkness power may allow him to suppress or contain the second fruit's essence.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Demonstrated when Blackbeard shows his Dark-Dark power in his right hand while simultaneously using the Gura Gura power in his left hand.

users.circumstances: Ivankov continues to use their Devil Fruit abilities in combat against Admiral Akainu.

abilityReveals.description: A hormone technique that enhances Ivankov's facial features for combat purposes, deployed during the battle against Akainu.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used while Ivankov attempts to block Akainu's pursuit of Luffy alongside Inazuma.

users.circumstances: Inazuma continues to use their scissor powers in combat.

abilityReveals.description: Inazuma uses their scissors ability to create defensive barriers and blockades against Akainu's magma attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Deployed alongside Ivankov to help block Akainu's pursuit of Luffy during the escape from Marineford.
